<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

A map view.

## Properties

### `map_options`
Configures the look and feel of the map.

* `provider`: Map provider and style to use.
* `zoom`: Zoom level for the map. The default is 16.
* `access_token`: Optional access token to access the map tiles.

## API reference links
 * üêç [Python API docs for `MapView`](https://ref.rerun.io/docs/python/stable/common/blueprint_views#rerun.blueprint.views.MapView)
